website_summaries.verdict: Between its moderate price, premium construction, and lifelike design, this gigantic sea turtle makes a fantastic gift for kids who absolutely love reptiles and marine animals.
pros: Realistic shell pattern, eyes, and flipper details
cons: This stuffed sea turtle isn’t machine washable

customer_reviews.title: Cannot return
customer_reviews.text: This turtle is so much larger than you think it will be when you are measuring at home. For a lot of people this may be a good thing but for us it was a problem. Despite coming in a sealed package with a so-called happiness guarantee I was surprised to find out that this item is not eligible for return. Nowhere in the entire description do they state that. This feels really dishonest and misleading. I bought another stuffed animal from this company that I loved, but despite that I don't think I will purchase any more of their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to keep him!
customer_reviews.text: This guy is adorable. I got him for my 2 year old grand daughter. I almost kept him for myself. He is so lifelike, big, and soft. There is not much else to say. I've attached a picture of him in our recliner so you can get a feel for his size.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: This is just a beautiful elegant stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: This is just a beautiful elegant stuffed animal. I wanted to hug him as soon as I took him out of the box - I love that he is realistic looking with truer to life coloring (not garish) There is something quite wise and calming about sea turtles and Melissa & Doug have really captured those qualities in this dear plush creature. Very soft and very huggable. I got this turtle for my grandson and I hope he loves it !! I thought the price was a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully detailed! Realistic NOT cartoonish
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully detailed! Realistic NOT cartoonish! About 2 and a half feet long! My son LOVES this plush, cuddly sea turtle! The perfect addition to his ocean themed room!
customer_reviews.author: Wes Adams

customer_reviews.title: Quality Unexpectedly  Lacking
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed upon the receipt of this item, which I did not expect. Size wise, it’s not as large as I expected but that’s neither here nor there. More importantly, however, is the quality which I find to be greatly lacking in general and especially in comparison to other Melissa & Doug items purchased in the past. The material is not as soft as it appears to be and there is a noticeable hole in one of the legs. This was to be a Christmas gift for my daughter, but now I’m questioning whether to keep it
customer_reviews.author: Becky K.

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter Loves Crush!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter several months ago and she loves it! The moment she saw this, she gave it a big hug and kiss. She even named him Crush! This is a good size for a 2 year old to lay on or use as a pillow. The colors are vibrant and it looks like a real turtle.
customer_reviews.author: HockeyMom86

customer_reviews.title: Realistic stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: First off, this turtle is adorable! My son saw it in a gift shop and I couldn’t bring myself to spend so much money on it. After seeing it on amazon for less money I decided to buy it because my son loves turtles. He was ecstatic when it arrived- it’s large and sturdy so you can display it if you want, but it’s soft enough to cuddle with too. It’s pretty realistic looking also! If you have a turtle lover in your life, they will love this!
customer_reviews.author: Laura F

customer_reviews.title: A must for sea turtle fans!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this turtle for my 3-year-old nephew for his birthday because he's a fan of turtles. I LOVE the size of this turtle, and he sleeps with him on his bed. He carries this guy around the house and lays on him. I read some reviews where people are upset about the softness of the fabric, but quite honestly, it's pretty soft. It's not fleece soft, but it feels good to the touch, and my nephew absolutely loves it! This was a great price for a well-made, BIG stuffed animal!
customer_reviews.author: DiBeas

customer_reviews.title: This turtle was great as a gag give and the best
customer_reviews.text: This turtle was great as a gag give and the best, large turtle you'll find if looking for a large stuffed turtle :) I went to Aruba for a vacation and bought back all my coworkers a ceramic turtle, about the size of a hockey puck. I brought back my CEO a larger one, a little larger than the size of a hand. The contract CFO of our company who has only been there for about 2 months would not stop giving me a hard time about the difference in size of their turtles, so for Christmas, the CFO received this turtle.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaCarlton

customer_reviews.title: TURTLE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these as Christmas gifts for my friend's kids (1 year old and 2 year old boys). They were a huge hit! They are large, plush, and durable. Exactly as pictured and described by the seller. They are big and firm enough for kids to use as a pillow. Small kids can almost entirely lay on top of it. It's a fun toy for young kids that I'm sure they will enjoy for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great for turtle lovers of all ages
customer_reviews.text: Giant realistic sea turtle! Gave to my 19 year old son whom loves turtles for Christmas. Attached to an electronic device that he really wanted. He uses the turtle as a pillow on his bed and has added it to his loved collection of turtles we have given him over the years. Win.
customer_reviews.author: C. Holguin

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: I would not consider this a soft plush stuffed animal. Its more like those hard animals you can win from a fair. The material on the head is soft but the ready of the body is scratchy. Was a gift for an adult and they said it was too hard to cuddle with. I’m now finding that this can not be returned even though the description says happiness guarantee. Highly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Ferris

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old likes stuffed animals in general, that's when I saw this large turtle I knew he would like it. It's very well made and looks durable. I must say my wife was not too excited about it since he carries it everywhere now and due to the size it does get in the way sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 205

customer_reviews.title: Great Large Plush Toy!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality and softness - so large and well-filled - this was very happily and enthusiastically received as a gift by 5 yr. old! Nicely constructed for years of play or rest, as expected for a Melissa & Doug product.
customer_reviews.author: SouthJersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality stuffie
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our newborn son, sister got a big seal when she was born. Now at 9 months he is really loving it. He crawls over to it, crawls up on top and bites the heck out of it while smiling the whole time! We love Melissa & Doug toys, our playroom usually has them scattered about the floor.
customer_reviews.author: DeanD

customer_reviews.title: Melissa and Doug have produced a gorgeous, colorful sea turtle!
customer_reviews.text: This sea turtle exceeded my expectations! Another quality Melissa and Doug product, it is used for our 2 Shih Tzu babies (really toddlers!). They lounge, they rest, they sleep on it - they love it! Perfect for your pup or a small child, it is a lovely plush and lifelike sea turtle. Will try to get a photo soon.
customer_reviews.author: janet d.

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart right around the one month mark
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in great condition and then slowly developed numerous holes and the webbing started showing just after the one month mark and it cannot be returned. Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Huge turtle brought a huge smile to my kiddos' faces
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these- one for each kid. They LOVE them. Sometimes they use them as a pillow or prop during video games. The pattern gives the turtle a realistic look. Large enough to be an impressive gift but can still be carried around easily by a 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Dreamy plush loves
customer_reviews.text: I love Melissa & Doug! Their plush animals are amazing! It started with a medium grey elephant. I have high functioning autism and collect elephants because like them, I never forget. Then I found this big beautiful sea turtle who looked so loving. My husband and I love him! We named him "home" and he lives in our bed which I think of as a sea of blankets. He is soft and lovely. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC TURTLE!
customer_reviews.text: He was bought for my daughter's nautical themed guest room and he's perfect for use as a pillow for the queen sized bed.. He is so well made and a great price too.
customer_reviews.author: daryl haakonson

customer_reviews.title: and the shell feels a little more solid than I would have liked (for cuddling with
customer_reviews.text: I bought this turtle as a gift for my grown boyfriend. We use him as an extra pillow on our giant bed, and he adds a lot of flavor to the room. My one wish is that he were a little softer. I agree with some of the other reviews that the material isn't very soft, and the shell feels a little more solid than I would have liked (for cuddling with!).
customer_reviews.author: A. Xu

customer_reviews.title: Great nap time buddy for grandson
customer_reviews.text: Nice size, great nap buddy for grandson. Well made, comfy soft, not flimsy or floppy
customer_reviews.author: PJ Crash

customer_reviews.title: Super adorable and big but not as soft as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable and big but not as soft as I thought it was going to be. Kind of scratchy feeling. It was a gift for a 2 year old, she loved it none the less.
customer_reviews.author: MellyWhoDo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: While in Hawaii my 12 year old son, who is fascinated with turtles, saw a turtle like this one. It was super expensive so I told him I would shop around and would get him a better turtle for the money. I was not disappointed with this one! It is just the perfect size to cuddle with or use as a pillow in a bed. It's soft and comfy, feels more like a pillow than a stuffed animal. The detail is excellent; very realistic. We are glad we waited as this is a much better choice.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: This is definitely the gift I'm most excited to see opened this Christmas!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG.... I can't tell you how excited I was to find this stuffed turtle. First of all, it's HUGE! My 16yr old stepson had a stuffed fish for years, I mean before I met him. It had seen better days. I promised him if the fish "bit the dust" that I would replace it with something better. He's really into turtles. This is definitely the gift I'm most excited to see opened this Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: Boss Lady Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Huge, soft, perfect sea turtle. My son loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son received this sea turtle from Santa. I was a little skeptical on getting it because some reviews said it was hard and scratchy. That is NOT the case. It is very life like and extremely soft. It is large enought to use as a pillow and my 7 year old takes it everywhere. I would highly suggest this for any turtle lover. And for the price, the quality and size is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: crystalmom24

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a turtle lover
customer_reviews.text: My turtle obsessed son received this for his birthday. He loves it, it is very soft. Its so huge, he can barely carry it around but that doesn't stop him from trying. The one we received does not have a lot of stuffing around the neck of the turtle so his head kinda flops down, but my son doesn't seem to mind. It is very realistic looking which is why I think my he likes it so much.
customer_reviews.author: M.A. MAC

customer_reviews.title: love it,,,,,,,
customer_reviews.text: love love love this turtle. IT IS BIG!!!! My grandson got this when he was five and has loved it even till today he is 8. very well made...and works a pillow
customer_reviews.author: dawgsmum

customer_reviews.title: Creating learning excitement
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of this sea turtle for my music students (4-8 yrs). It will allow for fun/silly but can also be the "conducting" spot for ensemble work and creating special moments while learning through play/music.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Melsheimer

customer_reviews.title: Made for a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my granddaughter for Christmas. She was surprised and quit pleased. She is a pre teen and loves it as pillow on her bed and floor while watching tv.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Soft but Durable
customer_reviews.text: Great size and durability. The perfect size to snuggle and use as a floor pillow. Love the soft colors. We love having this as a new friend in our Children’s Center to greet children visiting us.
customer_reviews.author: Dollar Family

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuffed animal
customer_reviews.text: I got it for a 12 year old who loves turtles. I liked that it is not babyish and it is big enough for your head to rest on.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrylmd

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute, great quality, and not very soft but that's how a stuffed animal turtle should be . Mine sits on my bed for decor I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Walker

customer_reviews.title: Sea turtle
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loves sea turtles as much as his Nana, so he will love this one, I do!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Stucker

customer_reviews.title: a great price. Four years and five months later we ...
customer_reviews.text: Before my boyfriend and I started dating we had gone to the Shedd Aquarium with some friends. We saw one similar to this hanging on display and I joked about getting it for him. A month after we started dating I found this online and was ecstatic to find it was the right size and, at the time, a great price. Four years and five months later we are still together, and it still has a place in our hearts.
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable to use as a pillow during tv time.
customer_reviews.text: My two year old nephew loves turtles. Melissa and Doug’s turtle, was an absolute hit!
customer_reviews.author: A.H. Young

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cuddly
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and cuddly. Purchased as a gift and the child loved it
customer_reviews.author: Brandy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Must have for ocean lovers!
customer_reviews.text: This guy is super plush and a great size. Colors are impressive and softly blended. A must have for any child that loves ocean creatures. Great for nighttime or movie time cuddling and playtime. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it arrived with box completely open and a noticeable puncture in the plush on the "shell" part. Other than that it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ms L

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: One of my daughter's favorite things. Very often sleeps with it. Large. The detail is amazing. Highly recommend, excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: arlene deaner

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This turtle is huge. My two year old can use it as a body pillow. Very nice quality, not quite as soft as I though it would be but still and very nice product from "Melissa & Doug". I will be buying the other stuffed animals they sell in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Beckham13

customer_reviews.title: Must have for turtle lovers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality my grandson lives him . He has great realistic features and is constructed very well
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent turtle
customer_reviews.text: Very life like. Nice and soft. Grandson loved it.pleasently surprised larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: marty H

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Totally love. Gift for 2 year old boy.
customer_reviews.author: Online shopper

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate description! and NON RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: I'm really disappointed with this product. The color of the turtle is very different - seems to be of a cheap quality and way off from the color you will see online - it has a lot more white specks. I just received it today and cannot return it. Amazon was great and issued me a refund, but this is dishonest and really messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Mallika Kanodia

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty big, our daughter likes to lay on it. It's super soft.
customer_reviews.author: WJTLW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves turtles and loves this one that’s practically her size.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ackers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your aquatic loving little ones
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loved seeing this sea turtle near the Christmas tree on Christmas Day. It’s nice and big , perfectly huggable . My little one loves using it as a pillow while she watches cartoons. It also looks realistic. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Forget about that lame teddy bear!
customer_reviews.text: It's really big, soft, life-like, and much more unique than the average child's stuffed animal. Makes a good pillow too.
customer_reviews.author: Stevo3000

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 year old grandson who loves sea turtles. He loves it. He cuddles it and pretends he is riding it through the ocean. Great quality and just what I was wanting.
customer_reviews.author: Banana

customer_reviews.title: Very cute little on he hard side
customer_reviews.text: Little pricey for a stuffed animal but my grandson loves Sea Turtles so he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda P.

customer_reviews.title: Sea turtle cuddles all day
customer_reviews.text: HUGE turtle, the size of my toddler. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Eva Tate

customer_reviews.title: Big, Sturdy- and a Bit Scratchy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this turtle for my 4-year-old son for Christmas because he's a fan of turtles. I LOVE the size of this turtle, and my son sleeps with him on his bed. I'm not a fan of the "shell" fabric, because it's pretty scratchy, and not at all soft and comfy. But my son doesn't seem to mind at all, and carries this guy around the house and lays on him. This was a great price for a well-made, BIG stuffed animal!
customer_reviews.author: The Real Me

customer_reviews.title: He is bigger than you might think. Makes a nice pillow
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren who live in Maui love Honu which is the Hawaiian name for turtle. I offered to mail him back but they wouldn’t hear of it! He went as a carry on . Very well made a pretty lifelike. They dubbed him the new family pet.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than Expected and AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Ryder wanted a stuffed turtle and was thrilled to get this for his birthday. It's very large and very cuddly.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Roberts of Spinach Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed at the detail for the price. Good construction. Wife loves Sea Turtles or "Honu" in Hawaiian. It is her snuggle buddy on nights I have to work. I would highly recommend this for purchase, but not for small children. Eyes could be an issue for younger children because of hard plastic and they may try to bite them off.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Bigger then you think, Kids love them ( 4 years old ).
customer_reviews.author: Crimson Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love to use asa pillow for a nap on the couch
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: We love this and we don't even have kids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so it can sit on our couch and we can snuggle with it. Very high quality and it is super soft. Great to have to lay on!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: BIG TURTLE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this turtle. My daughter calls this the "BIG TURTLE". She absolutely adores this thing and even has it sit at the foot of her bed. It is so large she can jump on top of it and give it huge hugs. Best money i've spent in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Defective Items...Not returnable.
customer_reviews.text: The turtle arrived missing a plastic eye and I was informed it was not eligible for return. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MagicMom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic oversized plush at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality--the size is exactly what I expected and it's super soft and cuddly. So happy with the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: kelly croghan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Just awesome! Oue daughter who is a Biological Oceanographer (BS degree) had a summer internship working with Sea Turtles! She'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hulapeng

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. The turtle is almost as big as her. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brenda N.

customer_reviews.title: Love this giant sea turtle!
customer_reviews.text: Love this giant sea turtle! Named her Tallulah! She is large and beautifully soft. Could use like a pillow or just to guard your bed... Seems well made and has a very pleasing facial expression.
customer_reviews.author: Alice B Toklas

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal.
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made for being a stuffed turtle. My 3-year-old LOVES it.
customer_reviews.author: Brocruit

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic!!! My little nephew loves it and I plan on getting him another stuffed animal give from these people for his next birthday!!!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Popins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves turtles and loves using this big sea turtle to sit on/play on/ and lay on. It is like a giant pillow and he's not rough he's actually quite soft and looks lifelike. If this toy happens to have something bad happen to it, I will be forced to buy another, but it was money well spent and I definately would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: REH

customer_reviews.title: These stuffed animals are great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this turtle. It's so big! We also bought the hippo.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Sooooooo cute
customer_reviews.text: And very soft and cuddly. Who knew a turtle could cuddle.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this, was the hit of Christmas and BB loving it every day. Thanks Mom...
customer_reviews.author: Mongo

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting a nice soft texture turtle
customer_reviews.text: For a plush stuffed item, this is not very soft. It is more firm than soft. I was expecting a nice soft texture turtle. It is decent size and my 2 year old loves it, but the quality of the fabric is not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Drahc

customer_reviews.title: Above expectation!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister and she LOVES it! Don't listen to what anyone says about it being rough or not soft. It's so soft that my sister lays on it and naps on it. If u know a kid (or a teen for that matter) that loves turtles this is the perfect gift for them!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a cuddly pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson. It is very soft, but has realistic coloring.
customer_reviews.author: B. B.

customer_reviews.title: Dogs favorite thing
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased three of these for my beagle. He loves it as a comfort pillow. Durable and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cuddly  Colorful  Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and could not be more pleased with this turtle's colors and softness. Excellent gift to give, or keep!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up.
customer_reviews.text: Very life-like looking and a good size. However, after four months with light use the stitching is coming out by the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves all things turtles. I cannot even express how happy he was to get this giant turtle. He now uses it as his pillow!
customer_reviews.author: Helen R

customer_reviews.title: Came with a hole in it
customer_reviews.text: My step-daughter paid for this stuffed animal herself but I was disappointed when it arrived because there was a hole under one of it's flippers. She also thought from the picture that it was bigger. She still loves the Sea turtle and I was able to sew the hole up but for the price I wasn't that impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary Hossink

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves sea creatures. He is so happy with this one and sleeps with it on his bed each night.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hennings

customer_reviews.title: Big and real life like
customer_reviews.text: It’s so big and real life like!! Was the perfect gift for my 8 year old who’s obsessed with turtles at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Olson

customer_reviews.title: I like the coloring and it makes a pretty good pillow
customer_reviews.text: The turtle is okay. I thought it should be fuller. It had a small hole where it was not sewn. I like the coloring and it makes a pretty good pillow. My grandson likes it so that's what matters.
customer_reviews.author: Tina R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought two turtles for my grandsons. They are fabulous. Soft and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful accent to the nursery
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful accent to the nursery. It is large and I’m sure that my nephew will have a good time with it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Drever

customer_reviews.title: Melissa and Doug Plush Turtle
customer_reviews.text: We gave this as a gift to a nine year old girl at Christmas. She loves animals and said she wanted an oversized plush for Chrstmas. this one was in my budget so I ordered. It is a really large turtle! Very cute and fun. Her mom says she loves it and uses it as a pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this. It's very detailed and so ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. It's very detailed and so soft! Larger than I was expecting, even though they give dimensions :)
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: It's Melissa and Doug ....
customer_reviews.text: Well worth it, going to be Christmas present for toddler so should be a hit. Large soft plush.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my girlfriend's favorite gifts I've gotten her. Great size and great for cuddling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome giant turtle! Very well constructed and huge! Any kid or adult young at heart would be thrilled to receive this. Well detailed.
customer_reviews.author: dayoopergal

customer_reviews.title: We named him Sven
customer_reviews.text: Amazing turtle for the price, nice size! Soft and almost realistic looking
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Pines

customer_reviews.title: This turtle is awesome. Ordered it for a kid's birthday
customer_reviews.text: This turtle is awesome. Ordered it for a kid's birthday, who happens to really love turtles. It was the hit of the party, and the kids were fighting over who got to hold him. He's definitely an heirloom toy, and is made well enough to pass down to the next generation when they're grown up.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel S

customer_reviews.title: This sounds like a problem others have had as well
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my daughter and now by February the fin is already detaching from the body. This sounds like a problem others have had as well. The quality definitely does not hold up to what we expect from Melissa and Doug products.
customer_reviews.author: NK

customer_reviews.title: M&D Giant Sea Turtle
customer_reviews.text: these M&D stuffed animals are a huge hit with my granddaughter ----she has loved everyone so far.
customer_reviews.author: deepstep al

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So soft!!!! My daughter loves this turtle. She's 9 and it's huge:)
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: What a cuddle buddy!
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves turtles & this made her day. She owns a Box turtle & 2 Red Sliders. And now, a stuffed turtle lol. The detailing is super.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daugher loves it
customer_reviews.text: Alter our daughters trip to Hawaii witch included a swim with sea turtles, I surprised her with this. Daddy is now a superstar in my baby's girls eyes! thanks guys this was just the ticket to make the old man cool again.
customer_reviews.author: Aktap

customer_reviews.title: My son loves turtles
customer_reviews.text: This is really cool and looks neat. Did arrive with a hole that went unnoticed until box was opened on Christmas morning. Had to do some repair since it was a gift but looks cool sitting on my son's bed
customer_reviews.author: sugarsprite

customer_reviews.title: Snake head on turtle body
customer_reviews.text: My son hates this turtle. He is an avid little naturalist and he says the head is all wrong - that it’s a snake’s head on a turtle’s body. He bought it with his own money and is crushed because apparently it can’t be returned.
customer_reviews.author: bythelake

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Stuffed Animal!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this for my mother who recently had surgery. She LOVES turtles, especially Sea Turtles and I was thrilled to find it. I thought it would be perfect for her to hold against her for when she coughs or to help her be comfortable in bed and it was just PERFECT. Also, all my nieces and nephews love it and want to use it as their pillow for watching movies or spending the night.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Giant Turtle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this turtle for my daughter to replace some of the stuffed toys she had to give up when moving. She loves it. The turtle is the size of a standard sleeping pillow. She evens uses it as a pillow some nights. The turtle is well made and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. PICKERING

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The description was almost 3 feet it is just over 2 feet. That is a big difference when you want it to be 3 feet
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

product_meta.title: Melissa & Doug Giant Sea Turtle - Lifelike Stuffed Animal (nearly 3 feet long)
product_meta.description:
At two feet long, this lifelike sea turtle is not shy! A delight to hug, use as a pillow, or just snuggle up with, this realistic creature of the deep features excellent construction and careful attention to its lifelike markings. The Melissa & Doug sea turtle toy provides children with several entertainment options. Kids can snuggle with their furry friend during story time, play pretend with it, and even read a story to their fuzzy friend. This plush sea turtle stuffed animal has been crafted from high-quality materials. The soft polyester fabric makes it easy for snuggle time yet durable enough to last through extended use. The Melissa & Doug Sea Turtle Giant Stuffed Animal is a delightful and cuddly gift for kids 3 years and up. Add the Melissa & Doug Tiger Stuffed Animal to round out the hands-on play and give kids an engaging option for screen-free experience. For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.” Today, Melissa & Doug is proudly partnering with the American Academy of Pediatrics to foster early brain development and help children build important life skills through play.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From classic wooden toys to crafts, pretend play, and games, Melissa & Doug products provide a launch pad to ignite imagination and a sense of wonder in all children so they can discover themselves, their passions, and their purpose. 

Since the company’s founding more than 25 years ago, Melissa & Doug has consistently delivered innovative products that inspire open-ended thinking, encourage kids to see new possibilities, and offer Countless Ways to Play. It’s part of a bigger vision to Take Back Childhood. Because by giving children a true childhood with the space and freedom to explore their world, we give them a path to realizing their full potential!
feature_bullets: LIFELIKE SEA TURTLE GIANT STUFFED ANIMAL: The Melissa & Doug Sea Turtle Giant Stuffed Animal is a realistic plush sea turtle that stretches nearly two feet long and is designed with beautiful markings and lifelike details.
CRAFTED WITH CARE: This ocean stuffed animal toy has been crafted from superior materials. The soft polyester fabric makes it both huggable and durable and features a washable surface.

MANY WAYS TO PLAY: This turtle stuffed animal provides children with several entertainment options. Kids can snuggle with their sea turtle during story time, pretend play, and even read a story to their ocean friend.

GIFT FOR 3 AND UP: This stuffed animal is a delightful and cuddly gift for kids 3 years and up. Add the Melissa & Doug Tiger Stuffed animal to round out the hands-on play and give kids an engaging option for screen-free experience.

“THE GOLD STANDARD IN CHILDHOOD PLAY”: For more than 30 years, Melissa & Doug has created beautifully designed imagination- and creativity-sparking products that NBC News called “the gold standard in early childhood play.”

100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: We design every toy to the highest quality standards, and to nurture minds and hearts. If your child is not inspired, give us a call and we’ll make it right. Our phone number is on every product!
